tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, to front, i.e. stand boldly out opposite; by implication (causatively), to manifest; figuratively, to announce (always by word of mouth to one present); specifically, to expose, predict, explain, praise

tokens.resolved_gloss: used very widely as demonstrative, lo!; interrogative, whether?; or conditional, if, although; also Oh that!, when; hence, as a negative, not

tokens.resolved_gloss: to know (properly, to ascertain by seeing); used in a great variety of senses, figuratively, literally, euphemistically and inferentially (including observation, care, recognition; and causatively, instruction, designation, punishment, etc.)
tokens.translation: to know (properly, to ascertain by seeing); used in a great variety of senses, figuratively, literally, euphemistically and inferentially (including observation, care, recognition; and causatively, instruction, designation, punishment, etc.)

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)
tokens.translation: properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)
